availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Newman Estes (Caldwell County, Kentucky, grocery merchant)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, grocery merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Estes. Father of John Estes, Nancy E. Estes, Alex Washington Estes and Sarah C. Estes. Stonemason in Christian County, Kentucky in 1850. Grocery merchant in Princeton, Caldwell County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned five enslaved individuals in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 435A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 8.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 109.
